mean_en: connected with the practical use of machinery, methods, etc. in science and industry; connected with the skills needed for a particular job, sport, art, etc.; connected with a particular subject and therefore difficult to understand if you do not know about that subject
sentence: If you have any problems, please call me to get technical support.
sentence_trans: 如果你有任何问题，请打电话给我寻求技术支持。
word_etyma: techn技术，能力 + ical形容词后缀 → technical技术上的
